verses.verse: Whoever <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> but he who <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> is <S%H1198>stupid.<s%>
A <S%H2896>good<s%> man shall <S%H6329>obtain<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but he will <S%H7561>condemn<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of wicked <S%H4209>devices.<s%>
A <S%H120>man<s%> shall not be <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> but the <S%H8328>root<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
A <S%H2428>worthy<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> is the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of her <S%H1167>husband,<s%> but a <S%H954>disgraceful<s%> wife is as <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> in his <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
The <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> are <S%H4941>just,<s%> but the advice of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H4820>deceitful.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are about lying in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood,<s%> but the <S%H6310>speech<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> rescues <S%H5337>them.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H2015>overthrown,<s%> and are no <S%H1004>more,<s%> but the house of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H1984>commended<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H7922>wisdom,<s%> but he who has a warped <S%H3820>mind<s%> shall be <S%H937>despised.<s%>
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is he who is lightly <S%H7034>esteemed,<s%> and has a <S%H5650>servant,<s%> than he who <S%H3513>honors<s%> <S%H2638>himself,<s%> and lacks <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H3045>respects<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of his <S%H929>animal,<s%> but the tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H394>cruel.<s%>

He who <S%H5647>tills<s%> his <S%H127>land<s%> shall have <S%H7646>plenty<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> but he who <S%H7291>chases<s%> <S%H7386>fantasies<s%> is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2530>desires<s%> the <S%H4685>plunder<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8328>men,<s%> but the root of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5414>flourishes.<s%>
An <S%H7451>evil<s%> man is <S%H4170>trapped<s%> by <S%H6588>sinfulness<s%> of <S%H8193>lips,<s%> but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall come <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> by the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> The <S%H1576>work<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be rewarded to <S%H7725>him.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H191>fool<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but he who is <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8085>listens<s%> to <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>
A <S%H191>fool<s%> <S%H3045>shows<s%> his <S%H3708>annoyance<s%> the same <S%H3117>day,<s%> but one who <S%H3680>overlooks<s%> an <S%H7036>insult<s%> is <S%H6175>prudent.<s%>
He who is <S%H530>truthful<s%> <S%H6315>testifies<s%> <S%H6664>honestly,<s%> <S%H5046><s%> but a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H4820>lies.<s%>
There <S%H3426>is<s%> one who <S%H981>speaks<s%> rashly like the <S%H4094>piercing<s%> of a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> but the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H4832>heals.<s%>
<S%H571>Truth<s%>'s <S%H8193>lips<s%> will be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> but a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is only <S%H7280>momentary.<s%>
<S%H4820>Deceit<s%> is in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of those who <S%H2790>plot<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> but <S%H8057>joy<s%> comes to the <S%H3289>promoters<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
No <S%H205>mischief<s%> shall <S%H579>happen<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
<S%H8267>Lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but those who <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H530>truth<s%> are his <S%H7522>delight.<s%>
A <S%H6175>prudent<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3680>keeps<s%> his <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> but the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H200>foolishness.<s%>
The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> ones shall <S%H4910>rule,<s%> but <S%H7423>laziness<s%> ends in slave <S%H4522>labor.<s%>
<S%H1674>Anxiety<s%> in a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> weighs it <S%H7812>down,<s%> but a <S%H2896>kind<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> makes it <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> person is <S%H8446>cautious<s%> in <S%H7453>friendship,<s%> but the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> leads them <S%H7563>astray.<s%>
The <S%H7423>slothful<s%> man <S%H2760>doesn't<s%> roast his <S%H6718>game,<s%> but the <S%H1952>possessions<s%> of <S%H2742>diligent<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> are <S%H3368>prized.<s%>
In the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is <S%H2416>life;<s%> in its <S%H5410>path<s%> there is no <S%H4194>death.<s%>
